headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pfister Comet SR
content: Like everyone in Los Santos, youâ€™ve got fond memories of the original Comet: your first time curb crawling through Vinewood, or your first time losing the police in a straight line along the main drag. Well, get ready to forget them all, because the Comet SR has just rolled into town, and this race-tuned bullet is on a mission to push every other sports car out of your mind and out of your garage.
